title: Entertainment round-up: Cilla Black funeral and other news - BBC News
summary: cilla black 's funeral takes place in liverpool .
stars including paul o'grady and sir cliff richard attend .
hundreds of fans line route of funeral cortege .

documents.title: goodbye , cilla
text: cilla black 's body is now being laid to rest at allerton cemetery in liverpool , where she will be buried alongside her parents .
as sir tom jones commented earlier , her memory will live on , every time we play one of her records .
on which note , we will close today 's coverage of the cilla 's funeral .
scroll down to see some of the stories , tributes and images from the day , as well as a look at some of the day 's other entertainment stories .

documents.title: 'such fun '
text: composer andrew lloyd webber told the bbc cilla black was `` always such fun '' as a friend .
`` she just enjoyed life and was fantastic to be around , '' he said .
`` she was a fabulous interpreter of songs - far better than people thought .
she could take a lyric and really make you believe it . ''

documents.title: 'tears and laughter '
text: speaking after the funeral , tv presenter carol vorderman said there had been `` a lot of tears and a lot of laughter spilt '' inside the church .
`` cilla was the woman who i looked up to , '' she added .
`` she was the most professional woman presenter we 've ever had .
`` and as a friend , she was always giving me advice about men !
we always had a laugh . ''

documents.title: 'a lorra lorra laughs '
text: actor les dennis ( centre ) spoke to bbc news after the funeral .
he said : `` the service was magnificent .
everybody who spoke was so beautifully respectful and held it together so well .
`` it was amazing in the church and very moving and a lorra lorra laughs , and cilla would have liked that there were a lorra lorra laughs .
`` she was the first lady of liverpool and it 's fitting that she 's come home . ''

documents.title: cilla taken for burial
text: there was a round of applause as cilla 's coffin was carried out of the church , to the strains of the beatles ' long and winding road .
a police escort is waiting outside to escort the mourners to a private burial in allerton cemetery .

documents.title: paul o'grady 's closing comments
text: `` i 'm so grateful she let me into her whirlwind life and we spent nearly two decades together hell-raising - if you pardon the expression .
`` i do n't know what i 'm going to do - the light went off a couple of weeks ago and its not come back on yet .
i 'm just going to miss her so much .
ta-ra girl - i 'll see you on life 's highway . ''

documents.title: o'grady fluffs line
text: paul o'grady slipped up during his speech saying `` cilla was a true daughter of london '' , before correcting himself and saying liverpool , much to the amusement of the congregation .

documents.title: paul o'grady tribute
text: `` she loved life .
we got up to a lot of trouble , but we laughed while doing it .
`` i remember her losing her keys and getting wedged in a window in barbados with me holding her ankles and when the neighbours came out she shouted 'surprise surprise ! ' ''
`` then there was the time i broke my nose in a jacuzzi in barbados .
[ cilla 's best friend ] pat come rushing up the stairs and could n't find any ice , she had a bag of sprouts .
cilla had been sunbathing - she had no make up on and she rushed out .
`` we went to the hospital and cilla had taken a water tablet and she had a bad cold as well - so she was in and out of the toilet going ( sniffs , wiping her nose ) .
we looked like something out of shameless . ''

documents.title: paul o'grady tribute
text: `` i 've got fabulous cilla stories because we had such a good time together - something always happened , usually to me .
`` i first met her on parkinson 's and we just clicked and were soul mates .

`` after bobby died we decided to go to new york and i introduced her to the finer things of new york like bars , burlesque shows and nightclubs with such a reputation taxi drivers were always reticent to drop us off. ``

documents.title: paul o'grady tribute
text: paul o'grady has offered a final tribute , he began :

`` i 've been asked to speak about cilla on numerous occasions but i never thought i 'd be doing it now at a time like this because i thought cilla was indestructible and thought i would go first , given the state of my heart .
`` in fact we discussed my funeral at length and she had a major role in it that it involved a mantilla and lilies . ''

documents.title: son ben speaks
text: cilla 's son ben gave a touching speech , saying : `` mum was always young at heart and i think this was one of the reasons why people loved her dearly .
`` she loved being a star , she lived to entertain and make people happy .
even though mum was a star for more than 50 years , she was always happy to have a laugh at herself .

`` mum 's death was such a shock , but i for one take some solace in knowing that it happened in one of her most favourite places in the world - her sun terrace in spain doing one of the things she loved the most - sunbathing and listening to music .
`` she will be missed by so many . ''
he finished by reading the poem farewell my friends by rabindranath tagore .

documents.title: crowds turn out for cilla
text: hundreds of people turned out to pay their respects on the route of the funeral cortege and at the church in liverpool .

documents.title: anyone who had a heart
text: the congregation were invited to receive communion or a blessing , followed by the playing of a recording of cilla 's anyone who had a heart .
cilla recorded the burt bacharach song in 1964 and it spent three weeks at the top of the charts .

documents.title: 'liverpool 's cinderella '
text: ahead of jimmy tarbuck reading the prayers of the faithful , he said : `` usually i say i 'm happy to be here , but today that is not the case .
today is a sad day and i 'm sorry to be here . ''
he then invited family , friends and fans of cilla to remember the impact she has made on their lives .
`` for the people of liverpool , young and old , who took her to their hearts , lord , hear us . ''
he finished by saying : `` for each and every one in st mary 's church today , remember cilla : our mum , our nan , certainly our treasured friend - liverpool 's cinderella .
`` she was the first lady of showbusiness .
to be born a lady is an accident - to die one is an achievement . ''

documents.title: homily
text: bishop tom delivered the homily , highlighting cilla 's faith that was tested during her younger days .
he said cilla had `` the five f 's in her life - friends , family , football , fun and faith '' .
`` it was a tough upbringing and a faith that gave her confidence in crisis .

documents.title: biggins gives reading
text: entertainer christopher biggins has delivered the second reading - from the book of wisdom ( 3:1-9 ) .

documents.title: cilla 's son gives first reading
text: robert willis , cilla 's eldest son , tells the congregation : `` to hear her laugh and to laugh with her was simply a beautiful experience . ''
he then continues with the first reading , a poem by henry scott holland , which he previously read at his father , bobby 's funeral service .
`` death is nothing at all .
`` i have only slipped away into the next room .
`` i am i , and you are you .
`` whatever we were to each other , that we are still .
`` call me by my old familiar name .
`` speak to me in the easy way which you always used .
`` put no difference in your tone .
`` wear no forced air of solemnity or sorrow .
`` laugh as we always laughed
`` at the little jokes we enjoyed together . ''

documents.title: sir cliff sings
text: sir cliff is singing the hymn faithful one , whose lyrics include the lines :
`` faithful , faithful to the end / my true and precious friend ,
`` you have been faithful / faithful , so faithful to me . ''

documents.title: sir cliff richard delivers eulogy
text: sir cliff richard is sharing his memories of cilla black as the service begins .
`` you forget how much people loved her .
she took the country by storm because she became our greatest tv presenter , probably of all time . ''
`` you ca n't help but remember cilla without funny things happening .
it was part of her life .
`` we used to talk about old age .
i used to say , 'you know cilla , i 'm three years older than you ' .
`` and she 'd reply , 'i know , chuck , and it 'll always be that way . ' ''

documents.title: sir tom jones pays tribute to cilla
text: sir tom jones spoke to bbc news outside the church where cilla black 's funeral will be held , and recalled his first meeting with the star .
i worked with cilla in 1964 - it was her tour [ and ] i filled in for pj proby .
her tour was the first major tour that i was ever on .
it 's not unusual had just come out and it was a fantastic experience .
we were friends from them on .
we sang some duets together and then we would holiday together in portugal .
she was a lovely person .
a down-to-earth person .
she never put on any airs or graces .
she never became a showbiz personality .
i think she 'd want to be remembered as a singer - which she was .
she was a hell of a singer .

documents.title: us cinema chain introduces security checks
text: a us cinema chain is to inspect the bags and purses of all moviegoers entering its buildings , in the wake of a fatal shooting at the grand 16 multiplex in lafayette , louisiana , last month .
two women died and nine others were injured when a gunman opened fire on the audience watching amy schumer 's comedy trainwreck .
`` security issues have become a daily part of our lives in america , '' said regal entertainment group
regal , which is not affiliated with the lafayette cinema , said it wanted `` our customers and staff to feel comfortable and safe when visiting or working in our theatres '' .
`` to ensure the safety of our guests and employees , backpacks and bags of any kind are subject to inspection prior to admission .
we acknowledge that this procedure can cause some inconvenience and that it is not without flaws , but hope these are minor in comparison to increased safety . ''

documents.title: funeral will be 'a cilla-bration '
text: among the mourners at cilla black 's funeral cortege is tommy sandhu - a former blind date contestant who now works as a presenter on the bbc asian network .
he said it was impossible not to smile when remembering cilla this morning : `` there 's laughter around and everyone 's just reminiscing .
because you kind of go , it 's sad , and then as soon as you start thinking about her , you think of a funny story .
`` because those are the memories - she was just someone who just created good times .
so i kind of want today to be a celebration , a cilla-bration , and we all kind of come away sharing all the fun times that she gave us . ''

documents.title: jennifer aniston shows off wedding ring
text: jennifer aniston attended the premiere of her new film she 's funny that way in los angeles last night , giving fans their first chance to glimpse her wedding ring .
the actress was making her first public appearance since tying the knot with justin theroux in a secret ceremony on 5 august .

aniston plays a therapist in the film - a screwball comedy about a theatre director ( owen wilson ) who casts a call girl ( imogen poots ) in a new play alongisde his wife ( kathryn hahn ) and her ex-lover ( rhys ifans ) .

the peter bogdanovich film has received mixed reviews - with the telegraph calling it an `` hysterical '' comedy , and the hollywood reporter describing it as `` strained - though mildly enjoyable '' .

documents.title: len goodman waltzs away from dwts
text: ballroom king len goodman is quickstepping away from his role as a permanent judge on dancing with the stars - the us version of strictly come dancing .
the 71-year-old served as head judge for 20 series of the show , which runs twice a year .
abc said he was leaving to concentrate working on strictly and spend more time with his family .
goodman used to travel every week between the uk and us while filming both dancing shows , and has previously spoken about how all the air time takes it toll .
he previously hinted in december he may be leaving the show , but it is the first time abc has confirmed the move .
dancing with the stars ' executive producer rob wade said :
len will not be returning as a judge this season on dancing with the stars due to his schedule as a judge on strictly come dancing in the uk and the birth of his new grandson .
he still might be involved in the season at some capacity , but we will have to wait and see .

we are planning on having great guest judges for some shows to join [ judges ] bruno ( tonioli ) , carrie ann ( inaba ) and julianne ( hough ) , and i 'm sure we will see len in the ballroom again soon .
rather than appointing a new fourth judge , abc said the show would feature a host of guest judges , although they have yet to be announced .
the new series on 14 september .

documents.title: confirmed : banksy is putting on a show at the seaside
text: the last week has seen rampant speculation that bristol 's elusive graffiti artist , banksy , was setting up an exhibition in a derelict seaside lido at weston-super-mare .
well , this morning has seen the rumours put to rest : the show is called dismaland , it is by banksy and it will be in situ at the tro for six weeks .
the show features originals by banksy as well as work by damien hirst , jenny holzer , block 9 , julie birchill and the klf 's jimmy cauty .
`` i loved the tro as a kid , so getting to throw these doors open again is a real honour , '' banksy said .

documents.title: kelly clarkson announces pregnancy on stage
text: pop star kelly clarkson has revealed she 's expecting her second child with her husband brandon blackstock in the middle of a concert in los angeles .

the singer made the surprise announcement after halting a performance of her song piece by piece as she choked back tears ( the song is both a rebuke to her absent father , and a love letter to her husband . )
`` i was not planning on announcing this .
i 'm totally pregnant .
i 'm having a really hard time , '' she said .
after finishing the song , clarkson commented : `` i 'd like to apologise to my husband .
that was not planned .
i just did n't want you to think i was crazy or something .
honestly , i 'm just so hormonal today .
i have n't vomited yet .
that is a freakin ' win , y'all . ''
we think that is a first for an artist to announce that she is pregnant during a show from our stage !

documents.title: cilla black remembered
text: family and friends are to pay their respects to cilla black at her funeral in liverpool later .
sir cliff richard is due to sing at the mass , while tv stars paul o'grady , jimmy tarbuck and christopher biggins will give readings along with the entertainer 's sons robert and ben .
fans have been asked to line two miles of the funeral cortege route ahead of the mass at 13:00 bst ,
